Text: Thanks!  In some ways I think this miniseries are better than the recent Walt Disney movie..  it has alot of charm, that's for sure :)
Oh, redchameleon, you are a star!  I *loved* this when I were a lad, hehe!  Can't wait to see this again!  "Slartibartfast?!?!"  "Sector ZZ9 Plural Z Alpha" and all that...

great movie ^^
but can you seed a little  more please..?
Thanks for this. Someone from Denmark stole my VHS copy.

This IS better than recent movie with radio play soundtrack. Got to 84% downloaded and now NO SEEDERS anymore!  {at 0(9) for last day} - Damn ! 
Maybe can find used disk.

Well, I hung in and 2 seeders came back online and I eventually got the files.
Will leave it on for a while so others don't suffer like I did. 
It really is better than current movie, with many more scenes and the superior BBC radio play sound track integrated.
What is the source? Original VHS, latest DVD with extra footage, etc.?
